mapper.select: /*예약조회*/ SELECT booking_cd AS bookingCd ,facility_cd AS facilityCd ,facility_goods_cd AS facilityGoodsCd ,user_id AS userId ,goods_ctg_cd AS goodsCtgCd ,booking_date AS bookingDate ,booking_start_time AS bookingStartTime ,booking_end_time AS bookingEndTime ,booking_state AS bookingState ,booking_pricea AS bookingPrice ,booking_reg_date AS bookingRegDate FROM booking WHERE facility_goods_cd = #{facilityGoodsCd};

/*구장대표코드로 구장 조회*/ SELECT fs.facility_stadium_cd ,fs.facility_goods_cd ,fs.facility_cd ,fs.goods_ctg_cd ,fs.sports_cd ,fs.user_id ,fs.facility_stadium_nm ,fs.facility_stadium_reg_date ,fs.facility_stadium_detail ,sp.stadium_price_cd ,sp.sports_cd ,sp.day_price ,sp.night_price ,sp.hol_price ,f.main_ctg_cd ,f.facility_address ,f.facility_detail_addr ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_tell ,stadium_file.file_cd ,stadium_file.re_file_name ,stadium_file.original_file_nm ,stadium_file.stored_file_path ,stadium_file.represent_img FROM facility_stadium AS fs INNER JOIN stadium_price AS sp on fs.facility_stadium_cd = sp.facility_stadium_cd INNER join facility AS f on fs.facility_cd = f.facility_cd left join (SELECT rfwg.facility_goods_cd ,tf.file_cd ,tf.re_file_name ,tf.original_file_nm ,tf.stored_file_path ,tf.file_size ,tf.uploader_id ,tf.upload_date ,tf.updator_id ,tf.updated_datetime ,tf.represent_img FROM rel_file_with_goods AS rfwg INNER JOIN t_file AS tf on tf.file_cd = rfwg.flie_cd WHERE tf.deleted_yn != 'Y') AS stadium_file on fs.facility_goods_cd = stadium_file.facility_goods_cd WHERE fs.facility_stadium_cd = #{facilityStadiumCd};

/*회원이 구장 조회*/ SELECT fs.facility_stadium_cd ,fs.facility_goods_cd ,fs.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,fs.goods_ctg_cd ,fs.sports_cd ,s.sports_nm ,fs.user_id ,fs.facility_stadium_nm ,fs.facility_stadium_reg_date ,fs.facility_stadium_detail ,stadium_file.file_cd ,stadium_file.re_file_name ,stadium_file.original_file_nm ,stadium_file.stored_file_path ,stadium_file.represent_img FROM facility_stadium AS fs INNER join facility AS f on fs.facility_cd = f.facility_cd INNER join sports AS s on fs.sports_cd = s.sports_cd left join (SELECT rfwg.facility_goods_cd ,tf.file_cd ,tf.re_file_name ,tf.original_file_nm ,tf.stored_file_path ,tf.file_size ,tf.uploader_id ,tf.upload_date ,tf.updator_id ,tf.updated_datetime ,tf.represent_img FROM rel_file_with_goods AS rfwg INNER JOIN t_file AS tf on tf.file_cd = rfwg.flie_cd WHERE tf.deleted_yn != 'Y') AS stadium_file on fs.facility_goods_cd = stadium_file.facility_goods_cd LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};
/*구장코드별 구장가격 상세정보 조회*/ SELECT stadium_price_cd ,facility_stadium_cd ,sports_cd ,day_price ,night_price ,hol_price FROM stadium_price WHERE facility_stadium_cd = #{facilityStadiumCd};

/*구장코드별 구장 상세정보 조회*/ SELECT fs.facility_stadium_cd ,fs.facility_goods_cd ,fs.facility_cd ,fs.goods_ctg_cd ,fs.sports_cd ,fs.user_id ,fs.facility_stadium_nm ,fs.facility_stadium_reg_date ,fs.facility_stadium_detail ,stadium_file.file_cd ,stadium_file.re_file_name ,stadium_file.original_file_nm ,stadium_file.stored_file_path ,stadium_file.represent_img FROM facility_stadium AS fs left join (SELECT rfwg.facility_goods_cd ,tf.file_cd ,tf.re_file_name ,tf.original_file_nm ,tf.stored_file_path ,tf.file_size ,tf.uploader_id ,tf.upload_date ,tf.updator_id ,tf.updated_datetime ,tf.represent_img FROM rel_file_with_goods AS rfwg INNER JOIN t_file AS tf on tf.file_cd = rfwg.flie_cd WHERE tf.deleted_yn != 'Y') AS stadium_file on fs.facility_goods_cd = stadium_file.facility_goods_cd
WHERE facility_stadium_cd = #{facilityStadiumCd};

/*아이디별시설조회*/ SELECT f.facility_cd AS facilityCd ,f.facility_nm AS facilityNm FROM facility AS f left join facility_user AS fu on f.facility_cd = fu.facility_cd WHERE fu.user_id = #{userId} AND fu.facility_approve_state = 'Y'OR f.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY f.facility_cd;
/*종목조회*/ SELECT sports_cd AS sportsCd ,sports_nm AS sportsName FROM sports

/*본인 시설 내 구장 조회*/ SELECT fs.facility_stadium_cd ,fs.facility_goods_cd ,fs.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,fs.goods_ctg_cd ,fs.sports_cd ,s.sports_nm ,fs.user_id ,fs.facility_stadium_nm ,fs.facility_stadium_reg_date ,fs.facility_stadium_detail ,sp.stadium_price_cd ,sp.day_price ,sp.night_price ,sp.hol_price FROM facility_stadium AS fs INNER join facility AS f on fs.facility_cd = f.facility_cd INNER join sports AS s on fs.sports_cd = s.sports_cd INNER join stadium_price AS sp ON fs.facility_stadium_cd = sp.facility_stadium_cd LEFT join facility_user AS fu on fs.facility_cd = fu.facility_cd WHERE fu.user_id = #{userId} AND fu.facility_approve_state = 'Y'OR f.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY fs.facility_stadium_cd;

/*구장 조회 관리자*/ SELECT fs.facility_stadium_cd AS facilityStadiumCd ,fs.facility_goods_cd AS facilityGoodsCd ,fs.facility_cd AS facilityCd ,f.facility_nm AS facilityNm ,fs.goods_ctg_cd AS goodsCtgCd ,fs.sports_cd AS sportsCd ,s.sports_nm AS sportsNm ,fs.user_id AS userId ,fs.facility_stadium_nm AS facilityStadiumNm ,fs.facility_stadium_reg_date AS facilityStadiumRegDate ,fs.facility_stadium_detail AS facilityStadiumDetail FROM facility_stadium AS fs INNER join facility AS f on fs.facility_cd = f.facility_cd INNER join sports AS s on fs.sports_cd = s.sports_cd LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage};

/*구장 가격 총 튜플 수*/ SELECT stadium_price_cd AS stadiumPriceCd ,facility_stadium_cd AS facilityStadiumCd ,sports_cd AS sportsCd ,day_price AS dayPrice ,night_price AS nightPrice ,hol_price AS holPrice FROM stadiumPrice;
